channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Airbnb exec quit her job to take a gap year with her husband and 3 kids—she credits the reset for propelling her to CEO of TaskRabbit
item.description: If you’re debating a career break, take note: Ania Smith’s year off in Argentina reshaped her life—paving the way to her current CEO role at TaskRabbi...

item.title: Summer Fridays are dead because remote work killed them
item.description: Companies are using relaxed schedules and decreased productivity as excuses to reel back the warm weather benefit.

item.title: Exclusive: Telegram blockchain startup TOP raises $28.5 million as messaging platform expands crypto footprint
item.description: Ribbit Capital led the Series A fundraise, with participation from Pantera Capital.

item.title: 3 takeaways from a cardiologist and ‘SuperAgers’ researcher on how to live longer and healthier
item.description: Dr. Eric Topol says science can make “big inroads by preventing age-related diseases.”

item.title: Can AI cook a brisket? We pitted three smart grills against each other to find out
item.description: Barbeque can be a high-tech game.
